wikipedia_page.main: Shaheen Jafargholi (Persian: شاهین جعفرقلی‎; born 23 January 1997) is a Welsh actor and singer. In 2009, he finished in seventh place on the ITV competition series Britain's Got Talent. Since then, he has portrayed the roles of Shakil Kazemi in EastEnders and Marty Kirkby in Casualty.
